about.title: About FakeKavi
about.subtitle: Where the difference between truth and lie disappears
about.whoWeAreText1: FakeKavi is a digital home for poems that aren't true, but feel true. Here every word is an exaggeration, every emotion an imagination, and every line a satire. But within this lie lies life's real truth.
about.whoWeAreText2: We believe that poetry is not just an expression of emotions, but also a means to see life from a new perspective. On FakeKavi, you'll find creations that will make you laugh, cry, make you think, and sometimes surprise you.
about.creativityDesc: Every poem is a new experiment
about.missionText1: FakeKavi's mission is to give Hindi literature a new dimension. We want to free poetry from the burden of seriousness and make it accessible and entertaining for everyone.
about.missionText2: Here you'll find experiments that might not be acceptable in traditional literature, but express the ironies of modern life in the best way.
about.quote:
True poetry is not what states the truth,
but what makes lies so beautiful
that they seem true.
